title: Intravenous therapy techniques
creator_credit: Morgana Films, Ross Matthews and Peter Dodds
brief_description: Made in the Intensive Care Unit of St Vincent’s Hospital, Melbourne this instructional film covers the insertion of catheter over needle; central venous catheterisation; measurement of central venous pressure; basic care in intravenous therapy; changing infusion bottle; infusion additives; infusion blockage; removal of infusion apparatus; alternative apparatus.
creator_credit_for_label: Morgana Films, Ross Matthews and Peter Dodds
